author: asianlego
title: Go-Go-Go-Kart
review:
This Go-Kart is really a recolored version of the 1096 Race Buggy from the Extreme Team series.
The vehicle structure is exactly the same and so is the numbered placard in the front. The minifig however has a clear helmet screen here but I do not remember if the face is the same with the 1096 driver. Also here the minifig has a white Octan outfit whereas the driver of the 1096 Race Buggy sports a red Octan outfit.

-asianlego

author: CommanderFanta
title: Ha Ha Ha It's Tiny!
review:
Anyway, My Brother Got This When We Went To A Kellogg's Themed Creche In The Shopping Centre, (He Was 4 Or 5 At The Time) But, On To Pros And Cons.

Pros:
Small, Fits In Your Pocket.
Cool Pieces, At The Time Many Of The Pieces Were Our Firsts
Driver Has A Funny French Mustache.
Very And I Mean Very Easy (Built In Under 30 Seconds)

Cons:
None I Love This Set!

P.S I Am Unsure Of The Price, Because I Got My One Free. Yay!

Commander Coca-Cola Signing Off

author: legoplasticman1111
title: how cute
review:
This set looks very small and cute there is hardly any detail and not much to the set at all but it is worth it in the end ill move on to the pros and cons

PROS
minifigure
printed parts

CONS
not much detail
could be allot better

Over all i think this set is very cute but from a collectors point of view just buy it for the sake of it there's nothing else you could do with it
